channel.title: [UnSolved]Update graphics help!
channel.description: Now I'm trying to update my graphics from 317 to the graphics like Near Reality, but I don't know where to start....all I want are npc models like Near Reality's NPC Models...So how do i update my graphics?

item.title: [UnSolved]Update graphics help!
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:8, topic:440068”][quote author=zzjimmy link=topic=542750.msg3977978#msg3977978 date=1334883843]
For npc graphics, get Tom’s cache suite and look up a tutorial on how to use it. For the gameframe, interfaces, buttons etc. you can use Tom’s cache suite or, there could be a cache folder in your client with all of the gameframe, interfaces, and buttons. If there is a folder, just edit the picture. If there is no folder, rip out the graphics you want from different servers and just import them into your server using Tom’s cache suite.
[/quote]

yea I couldn’t find npc in Tom’s cache suite…only items[/quote]

the models.

Read full topic

item.title: [UnSolved]Update graphics help!
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

zzjimmy:

For npc graphics, get Tom’s cache suite and look up a tutorial on how to use it. For the gameframe, interfaces, buttons etc. you can use Tom’s cache suite or, there could be a cache folder in your client with all of the gameframe, interfaces, and buttons. If there is a folder, just edit the picture. If there is no folder, rip out the graphics you want from different servers and just import them into your server using Tom’s cache suite.

yea I couldn’t find npc in Tom’s cache suite…only items

Read full topic

item.title: [UnSolved]Update graphics help!
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

For npc graphics, get Tom’s cache suite and look up a tutorial on how to use it. For the gameframe, interfaces, buttons etc. you can use Tom’s cache suite or, there could be a cache folder in your client with all of the gameframe, interfaces, and buttons. If there is a folder, just edit the picture. If there is no folder, rip out the graphics you want from different servers and just import them into your server using Tom’s cache suite.

Read full topic

[/quote]
